name: lost
description: LostGrid is a powerful grid system built in PostCSS that works with any preprocessor and even vanilla CSS.
author: Cory Simmons & Peter Ramsing <hi@peterramsing.com> (http://peter.coffee)

scripts.posttest: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.json && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/lcov-remapped.info -t lcovonly && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/lcov-report-remapped -t html
